# document-object-model-tutorial

# Tutorial for learning the Document Object Model (DOM)

Welcome to the Document Object Model (DOM) tutorial! In this tutorial, we
will learn about the DOM, why it is important, and how to use it to create
interactive web pages.

## Getting Started

To get started with this tutorial, follow these steps:

1. Clone the repository to your local machine.
2. Watch the recorded lecture series for each individual lecture.
   
## Features

Explore the following features of the DOM:

    1. Getting familiar with the DOM
    2. querySelector and querySelectorAll
    3. getElementById, getElementsByTagName, and getElementsByClassName
    4. Working with the DOM
    5. Modyfing multiple elements
    6. Traversing the DOM
    7. Adding Bootstrap classes to elements
    8. Creating elements
    9. Removing elements
    10. Adding and removing classes
    11. Adding and removing attributes
    12. Event listeners
